name: ADX Technologies
tag_list: cisco, computer-support, telephone, business-continuity, computer, network, phone-system, computer-network, data-cabling, ip
overview:
ADX offers a FULL range of computer services — everything from network configuration to network security and maintenance. They are in the business of making your business run as efficiently as possible through the use of technology.

Their main focus in on Cisco Advanced Technologies and have been implementing Cisco IP Telephone systems since 2001 — longer than any South Florida partner. They were recently recognized by Cisco as the Commercial Partner of the Year for the Southern Region for 2007.

ADX Technologies has been certified by Cisco and Microsoft to help small to medium business with everything from infrastructure, telephony, wireless technology, network security and business continuity.

ADX Technologies also has proactive managed service offering — ADX ProActive CareTM (APAC) — that manages business networks remotely or on site to keep business-critical technology running at peak performance and reduce network downtime.
